summary: Using an ENB, Loads of mods... Thanks to all their authors ! Just walking around exploring the beauty of skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
---
This is a Video Only 
---
IMPORTANT NOTE : The game looks even better while playing without recording. For some reasons, when i record with fraps the trees suddenly stop moving with the wind while the grass still moves. 
---
Description : With special combinations of certain mods you can obtain a unique flavour that makes skyrim your own skyrim. Try it out; download loads and loads of graphic overhaul mods and try different combinations to find your own way ! 

---
Credits and Mods Used: Thanks to all the authors of Graphic mods;
Including : Texture replacers, ENB\'s, Mesh improvers, Lighting mods, Armor and Weapon Mods, Hair mods, Body mods, Face mods...

I tried pretty much everything and i always try different combinations to get different flavours. Thanks to all the skyrim modding community to allow those unique experiences. On this vid :
--> Sharpshooters ENB
--> Realistic Lighting Overhaul
--> Skyrim HD 2k Textures
--> Lush Trees and Grass
--> Grass on steroids
--> Pure Waters
--> aMidianBorn Book of Silence
--> AOF Detailed Mountains
--> Beautiful Landscapes - Skyrim Grassification Project
--> Better Dynamic Snow
--> Bloody Dragon Bones
--> Book Covers Skyrim
--> Detailed Rugs
--> Enhanced Distant Terrain
--> Enhanced Blood Texture
--> Enhanced Night Skyrim
--> Finer Dust
--> Footprints
--> HD Better reflexion
--> Lanterns of Skyrim
--> Immersive Saturation Boost
--> Moss Rocks
--> Realistic Smoke and Embers
--> Ruins Clutter Improved	Models and textures	
--> SkyFalls and SkyMills
--> Skyrim Flora Overhaul
--> Static Mesh Improvement
--> TreesHD_Skyrim_Variation
--> Visible Windows
--> Vivid Landscapes - Dungeons and Ruins
--> Windmills resized 
--> Towns and Villages Enhanced

Pets, Bugs and Birds :
--> 83Willows 101BugsHD
--> Birds and Flocks
--> Pets of Skyrim 
--> skyBirds - Airborne Perching Birds

It contains Sound Overhaul aswell.

--> Sounds of Skyrim
--> Immersive Sounds - Magic

Vidéo here :  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b1fS3RYWxM0&feature=c4-overview&list=UUtfg0v6gwvG0H9IGZ4XKtXQ

-----------------------
ABOUT ME : I am a French Skyrim Player and I just began making vidéos to share to the skyrim community. (In French mostly; but I thaught this vid was universal :P) So if you want to see more; be shure to leeve feedback I would love to talk about it.

I want in someway make my contribution to the Skyrim Modding Community. 

PS : Sorry if I make some mistakes, English is NOT my native language ;)

Love you guys
author: KobaltGaming
